data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 16,341 believers in Santa Cruz de Tenerife, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Islas Canarias, Spain
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Islas Canarias, Spain and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Islas Canarias, Spain. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 16,341 believers in Santa Cruz de Tenerife, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Santa Cruz de Tenerife
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Islas Canarias, Spain.
Father, show your mercy on the 1,004,159 people in Santa Cruz de Tenerife who are far from you. Please add 204 new house churches this year.
Spirit, make the church in Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Islas Canarias, Spain humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.focus_label: Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Islas Canarias, Spain

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 16,341 believers in the county of Santa Cruz de Tenerife with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.
